attributes.action: Introduce tougher laws regarding the  murder of an animal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call for the penalties given to those found guilty of the act of murder towards animals of all kinds to be more severe.

We find it insulting that the maximum custodial sentence is 6 Months.

Those found guilty of murdering animals should face similar charges given to those who commit human murder.

Deliberately taking a life is murder, whether it be human or animal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
